item.description: Part of the global TechAviv family (http://www.techaviv.com), TechAviv MA is a local gathering of Israeli hi-tech entrepreneurs, executives and investors that meet monthly to showcase, discuss and help fellow Israeli startups. Each month three companies get 5 minutes to demo their products, followed by bi-directional Q&A with the group. Casual networking happens before and after the demos. Our mission is to help Israeli hi-tech entrepreneurs succeed worldwide by sharing our collective experience and contacts. Together we're creating a global support system for Israeli hi-tech founders. Founders and Investors: http://www.techaviv.com/members Twitter Feed: http://www.twitter.com/techaviv
item.name: TechAviv MA
